opts.opt: Pre-colonial Feature is associated with pre-colonial lifeways
Early settler-colonial Specific age indeterminate, but burial form and setting is consistent with the pre-1900 period
Pre-war Specific age indeterminate, but burial form and setting is consistent with the period 1900-1939
Post-war Specific age indeterminate, but burial form and setting is consistent with a post-1939 age
Early 19th C Grave markers in range 1800-1850
Late 19th C Grave markers in range 1851-1900
Early 20th C Grave markers in range 1901-1950
Indeterminate settler-colonial Settler colonial burials as indicated by burial form and setting, or associated material culture, but specific age is unknown
